data.title: Origin Theatrical
data.text:
latest

news

Love Never Dies

29 Mar

NOW AVAILABLE FOR AMATEUR LICENSING!!

The greatest love story of all time continues in Love Never Dies

Andrew Lloyd Webber's sequel to The Phantom of the Opera

Book and Music by Andrew Lloyd Webber

Lyrics and Additional Material by Glenn Slater

Additional Lyrics by Charles Hart

Book by Ben Elton

Additional Material by Frederick Forsyth

Full Length Musical, Drama Mystery/Thriller, Adaptation (Literature), Period Romance

Be transported to New York's playground, Coney Island, where the masked phantom has been hiding amongst the freaks and sideshows for 10 long years, yearning for his one true love and musical protégée, Christine Daaé. Lured by the bright lights and financial rewards of Coney, Christine and her family flee Manhattan to perform on stage for one last time, but Christine soon discovers the true identity of her mysterious impresario and that all is not what it seems.

Cast Size: 5M, 4F

Casting Opportunities: Ensemble Cast, Expandable Casting, Multicultural Casting, Reduced Casting/Doubling, Star Vehicle Female, Star Vehicle Male
